Author: staunch
Content:
I've managed to get my average daily meetings to zero and the one thing I miss is my great opportunity for doodling. I always doodle and it's always the most productive thing that happens at any meeting.

Riding bicycles and doodling. Two things I recently rediscovered. Haven't tried them together, yet.\n

Title: The Pmarca Guide to Startups, part 2: When the VCs say "no"
